content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: light_blue_stained_glass_pane
inventory=[{"type": "warped_door", "quantity": 63, "index": 14}, {"type": "light_blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 6, "index": 16}, {"type": "porkchop", "quantity": 36, "index": 21}, {"type": "light_gray_wool", "quantity": 34, "index": 30}, {"type": "spawner", "quantity": 30, "index": 43}]

thought: To craft a light_blue_stained_glass_pane, I need to place 6 light_blue_stained_glass in a line in the crafting grid. I will start by moving one light_blue_stained_glass from slot 16 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: light_blue_stained_glass_pane
inventory=[{"type": "light_blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "warped_door", "quantity": 63, "index": 14}, {"type": "light_blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 5, "index": 16}, {"type": "porkchop", "quantity": 36, "index": 21}, {"type": "light_gray_wool", "quantity": 34, "index": 30}, {"type": "spawner", "quantity": 30, "index": 43}]
thought: I will now move another light_blue_stained_glass from slot 16 to slot 2, which is next to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 2 with quantity 1

thought: Now that all 6 light_blue_stained_glass are in a line in the crafting grid, I can craft 16 light_blue_stained_glass_pane and move them to a free slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 16
